statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Clothing' AND price < 50;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category IN ('Clothing', 'Accessories') ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, description FROM products WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Home Decor';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT id, name, category FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 456;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, name, category FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND price < 50;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' OR category = 'Shoes' ORDER BY price DESC, name ASC;
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.price, u.username FROM products p INNER JOIN users u ON p.id = u.id WHERE u.address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE description LIKE '%organic%'
SELECT category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT product_name, price, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;

SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM product_categories JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING product_count > 2 ORDER BY product_count DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE description LIKE '%organic%' OR description LIKE '%natural%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, price, category FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, name, phone FROM vendors ORDER BY name, vendor_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT product_id, name, price, category FROM products WHERE category LIKE 'G%' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT p.name, v.name AS vendor_name, o.quantity FROM products p JOIN vendors v ON p.product_id = o.product_id JOIN orders o ON o.vendor_id = v.vendor_id
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT category, COUNT(*) as total_products FROM products GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY street_address DESC
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' AND price >= 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND category='Clothing';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT review_id, product_name, rating, comment FROM reviews INNER JOIN products ON reviews.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;
